sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create task record for Reporting to Datatilsynet

sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^title=Report to Datatilsynet^description=Gather the required information and report the breach it on virk.dk using the provided form.^assigned_to={{Created or Updated_1.current.assigned_to}}^priority=2^state=1

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Inform initial reporter that incident was handled and reported

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name, 

Your GDPR report,  Trigger➛...➛Title, has been processed and reported to the authorities. We thank you for your commitment to keeping our organization compliant and our data secure.

Kind regards,
Trigger➛...➛Name

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Add comment about new Breach Task

sys_variable_value.value: comments=Breach Task created for Triage (Determine validity of breach).

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Wait until persons have been notified
Inform initial reporter that incident was closed as a false alarm

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name, 

Your GDPR report,  Trigger➛...➛Title, has been reviewed and determined to be a false alarm. We thank you for your commitment to keeping our organization compliant and our data secure.

Kind regards,
Trigger➛...➛Name

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Add comment about new Breach Task

sys_variable_value.value: comments=Breach Task created for Inform Persons (let people know that their data may have been compromised).

sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^title=Triage {{Created or Updated_1.current.number}}^description=Determine the validity of this breach. Either declare it as a false alarm or continue to reporting.^assigned_to={{Created or Updated_1.current.assigned_to}}^priority=2^state=1

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Wait for GDPR Reporting Required decision

sys_variable_value.value: reported_to_datatilsynet=true^comments=Reporting completed. Breach procedure is now Closed Complete.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Add comment about new Breach Task

sys_variable_value.value: comments=Breach Task created for Report to Datatilsynet

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create task record for Inform Persons

sys_element_mapping.value: parent={{Created or Updated_1.current}}^title=Notify involved persons^description=There were {{Created or Updated_1.current.involved_persons}} affected by this incident. You need to inform them of the breach.^assigned_to={{Created or Updated_1.current.assigned_to}}^priority=2^state=1

sys_variable_value.value: GDPR Assessment is not needed (false alarm)
